text: Cute cafe with great coffee and very friendly staff. Quite modern and clean inside. Real espresso drinks. Free wifi. Definitely glad we stumbled on it!

Nice place ,nice people and great cappuccino.
Glad they are supporting the surrounding small businesses
Excellent spot. Their coffee and chai latte are very nice. The staff is friendly. The space is clean and well designed. And they even have a little play area for kids.
